articles.author: Aya Elamroussi, CNN
articles.title: Protesters voice their fury as Roe v. Wade reversal prompts abortion bans in some states
articles.description: Abortion-rights protesters continued to voice their fury and anguish nationwide Saturday following the seismic ruling by the US Supreme Court to eliminate the federal constitutional right to an abortion.

articles.title: Watch Fox News and MSNBC hosts react to Roe v. Wade ruling - CNN Video
articles.description: See how Fox News and MSNBC broke the news of the Supreme Court overturning Roe v. Wade and how hosts Rachel Maddow, Tucker Carlson and more analyzed the ruling.

articles.title: Video: Truck hits abortion rights protesters in Iowa - CNN Video
articles.description: A truck hit abortion rights protestors in Cedar Rapids, Iowa. One of the protestors was hospitalized and police are currently investigating the incident.

articles.author: Tim Lister, Oleksandra Ochman, Olga Voitovych and Jeevan Ravindran, CNN
articles.title: Ukrainian city of Severodonetsk now 'completely under Russian occupation' after months of fighting
articles.description: The eastern Ukrainian city of Severodonetsk is "completely under Russian occupation," the city's head of military administration said Saturday, following months of grueling and bloody fighting.

articles.title: Three people shot at Illinois WeatherTech facility
articles.description: A suspect is at large after a shooting at a WeatherTech facility in Bolingbrook, Ilinois, on Saturday morning, according to the Bolingbrook Police Department.

articles.title: Opinion: What Clarence Thomas is going to do now
articles.description: Thomas has always done his work with admirable candor. He tells us where the Court is headed. With five conservative justices on the bench, we should take him at his word, writes Jeffrey Toobin.

articles.author: Joan Biskupic, CNN legal analyst & Supreme Court biographer
articles.title: Analysis: Conservative justices seized the moment and delivered the opinion they'd long promised
articles.description: The five-justice Supreme Court bloc that overturned a half century of women's abortion rights on Friday had coalesced less than two years. But they had found their moment and they seized it.
